name: versal-runtime
description: Runtime for Versal flavor of custom elements

scripts.build: browserify -s VersalRuntime src/index.js > ./versal-runtime.js && ./node_modules/uglify-js/bin/uglifyjs versal-runtime.js --source-map versal-runtime.map.js -o versal-runtime.min.js

author: Andrey Mereskin <am@versal.com>
